name: 2D Numbers Shooter
description:
While you play 2D Numbers Shooter you will drive a ship in a very small rectangular scenario with limits marked by the edges of the game.

In this scenario, hostile bodies will appear that will go after you, being represented by numbers, which will be increasingly larger.
Your objective in this game is to destroy them by helping you with the 4 different weapons you have available.
Your 4 weapons can be changed by pressing the corresponding number (1-4) to them as seen in the lower part of the game. The weapons are:
1. Gun
2. Cannon
3. Missile
4. Ice

It seems a game too simple but it is not, since there are certain elements that increase its difficulty:

1.The game is very fast and with each round also increases the difficulty, so the more progress the more difficult it will be.

2. Large numbers will break down into small ones when they die, having to destroy them several times

3.The small size of the stage means that many times you can bump into the edge and die, as well as with the rotating objects on the map.
